errors.error_description: The 'Running webapp' section is placed before the 'Initial setup' section, which is a logical error as the application must be set up before it can be run.
correction_candidates: Swap the "Initial setup" and "Running webapp" sections.
Combine the "Initial setup" and "Running webapp" sections into one "Usage" section.
Add a note at the top specifying to follow setup instructions first.
Rename "Initial setup" to "Installation" and move it to the top.
errors.golden_answer: Swap the "Initial setup" and "Running webapp" sections.

errors.error_description: The setup command 'make -f build.mk' incorrectly references a non-existent 'build.mk' file instead of using the default Makefile.
correction_candidates: Create a 'build.mk' file that includes the 'Makefile'.
Change the command to '$ make -f Makefile'.
